Career Paths from Senior Software Engineer and Beyond(Discussion)
text:
Hey been pondering this for a bit but I'm trying to figure out where to go from Senior Software Engineer and beyond. I feel like typically the next step is moving up to Tech Lead or Management and I don't think it sounds fun to manage a team of engineers as far as career growth etc. I do enjoy designing processes on how we hire people, writing code tests, and interviewing. I also think I have a good eye on the product, what we should do next etc. I've also been told that if I wasn't in tech I would be great at sales FWIW.

Writing code started as a hobby for me that I turned into a career. I've been pondering the idea of where my career could go if I wanted to be more out of the code from 9-5. I would then turn coding back into a hobby that I do just for me and work on only things I find interesting. If I had to choose between Tech Lead and becoming a Manager I'd be more interested in Tech Lead. Although I think I want to be less technical/in the code and more operational.

Currently work at a small startup that is on the verge of landing the funding for a Series A round so as far as roles, the sky is the limit as I'm in on the ground floor. We already pretty much have a shoo-in for the head of engineering(only have 1 staff engineer atm) so that's probably out of the question.

Looking for suggestions on where I could go career-wise, all insight would be helpful thanks!

Ask HN: Any pre-funding founders received a SBIR SeedFund grant?
text:
I'm building a language learning startup using NLP and ML here and there. I've built a tech demo and I'm about to release a prototype, but no users yet.

I think I'd be a good fit for the SBIR SeedFund grant but haven't moved on it because my impression is that it is a huge time commitment to put together an application.

They even have advisors to help people figure out the first application steps. For someone not from academia, this looks like a full-time job for a while.

Does anyone have experience with this? What was your experience like? Do you recommend applying for founders in similar positions (pre-seed/funding)?

Is anyone willing to chat with me about this (email in profile)?

Are there any resources you can recommend?
